amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used to remove 3 Arctic Sales from the 2017-2022 Outer Continental Shelf Oil and Gas Leasing Proposed Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 92 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit funds to be used to remove 3 Arctic Sales from the 2017-2022 Outer Continental Shelf Oil and Gas Leasing Proposed Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A077) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 185 (Roll no. 461).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A077) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 185 (Roll no. 461).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A077) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
